channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Featured Image from URL (FIFU)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Featured Image from URL (FIFU)

item.title: CVE-2022-2241|2024-08-03T00:32:09.268Z -- unknown -- featured%20image%20from%20url%20%28fifu%29
item.description: The Featured Image from URL (FIFU) WordPress plugin before 4.0.1 does not have CSRF check in place when updating its settings, which could allow attackers to make a logged in admin change them via a CSRF attack. Furthermore, due to the lack of validation, sanitisation and escaping in some of them, it could also lead to Stored XSS issues

item.title: CVE-2022-2278|2024-08-03T00:32:09.669Z -- unknown -- featured%20image%20from%20url%20%28fifu%29
item.description: The Featured Image from URL (FIFU) WordPress plugin before 4.0.1 does not validate, sanitise and escape some of its settings, which could allow high privilege users such as admin to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed (for example in multisite setup)
